Templates.helpDescription:
Creates an active document from a draft document

The function supports several hooks as there is a certain coreography defined
Templates.name: sap.fe.actions.draft.activateDocument

Templates.helpDescription:
Creates a draft document from an existing document

The function supports several hooks as there is a certain coreography defined
Templates.name: sap.fe.actions.draft.createDraftFromActiveDocument
sap.fe.actions.operations.callActionImport

Templates.template:
callBoundAction(
	"${sActionName}", // string
	"${contexts}", // sap.ui.model.odata.v4.Context
	{
		actionParameters: ${actionParameters}, // map
		showActionParameterDialog: ${bShowActionParameterDialog}, // boolean
		label: "${label}", // string
		invocationGrouping: "${invocationGrouping}", // string
		onSubmitted: ${fn_onSubmitted}, // function
		parentControl: ${parentControl} // sap.ui.core.Element
	}
)
Templates.helpDescription: Calls a bound action for one or multiple contexts
Templates.name: sap.fe.actions.operations.callBoundAction

Templates.helpDescription: Creates and navigates a message page to show an error
Templates.name: sap.fe.controllerextensions.Routing.navigateToContext
